title: ICEYE announces framework contract with EMSA to enhance maritime operations through radar satellite imagery
summary: ICEYE has signed a multi-year framework contract with the European Maritime Safety Agency (EMSA) to provide SAR imagery data. The contract aims to enhance EMSA's maritime operations, including disaster response, pollution monitoring, and enforcement of EU maritime regulations. ICEYE will deliver persistent radar satellite imagery to support EMSA's Earth Observation Services across EU Member States.
why_it_matters: This contract solidifies ICEYE's role as a key provider of SAR data for critical maritime operations in Europe. It highlights the growing reliance on private space companies for real-time, all-weather Earth observation to support public sector agencies. The deal also underscores ICEYE's leadership in the SAR satellite market and its ability to deliver actionable insights for operational needs.

entities.name: Pekka Laurila
entities.role: ICEYE Co-Founder and Chief Strategy Officer
